name: Homigot
description: A plaza at the eastern tip of Korea, known as the tail of the tiger.

name: Youngil Beach
description: A lively beach in Pohang with beautiful sandy shores.

name: Jukdo Market
description: One of Korea's largest traditional markets, famous for fresh seafood.

name: Guryongpo
description: Guryongpo is a coastal town in Pohang known for its scenic harbor and historic sites.

name: Pohang Space Walk
description: A structure offering a high-altitude walking experience.
